name: Tokchi
tagline: A jQuery plugin that brings Mac OS style tokens to your web input fields
body:
### Chips & Tokens
Android calls them chips, Mac OS X calls them tokens. Now you can have them, own them, style them and add them
to your own web app.

Just like this...

![Replace keywords with tokens](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tiguchi/tokchi/master/wiki/token_example_1.png)

...or maybe like this

![Replace contact book entries with tokens](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tiguchi/tokchi/master/wiki/token_example_2.png)

### Demos
- [Mail app example](demo/mail.html)
- [Keyword search example](demo/keywords.html)
